document_title: Breast enlargement: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_name: phi-dai-tuyen-vu.json_1_How many main types of hypertrophy are there?
subsection_content:
Depending on the size of the mammary gland, there are two different levels of enlargement:
Enlarged breasts (macromastia): breast volume <2.5kg, in both men and women between the ages of 6-25.; Giant breasts (gigantomastia): breast volume >2.5kg, high rate in post-pregnant women or obese men.
